name: Hell's Office
description:
Hello i'm back ! 

This is my third ever made game "Hell's Office" made for the Mini jam 69 edition !

A game where you are emerged in the character of a Hell gate judge, and where you have to judge people based on thier deeds ! 

THIS IS NOT A FULL RELEASE, THIS IS A DEMO BASED ON A CONCEPT.

All suggestions and ideas are welcom ! 

sincerly, Kingoat.
